title: Events — National Ayurvedic Medical Association
cleaned_text: [ Sep 11 5:00 PM17:00 ](/events/2023/9/11/tips-and-tricks-for-standing-out-and-building-community-in-your-practice) [Professional Members Mingle: Tips and Tricks for Standing Out and Building Community in Your Practice](/events/2023/9/11/tips-and-tricks-for-standing-out-and-building-community-in-your-practice) Monday, September 11, 2023, with Melissa Camacho, Lac, CAP Would you love to connect more deeply to your community? What does your clinic add to the town that you live in? How do you enhance the lives of your clients using unique marketing gifts/tools and gatherings? Join us for a discussion of ways to more deeply connect with clients using an array of community-building tools, including marketing strategies. Melissa Camacho, Lac, CAP Melissa Camacho is a Licensed Acupuncturist, Diplomate of Oriental Medicine, NAMA Certified Ayurvedic Practitioner, and teacher of Ayurveda with over 15 years of clinical experience. She feels blessed to call herself an alumna of Vasant Lad's Svastha Acharya program. She has a Master of Science in Oriental Medicine and is nationally board certified and state licensed in Arizona. Sedona Sol Acupuncture & Ayurveda is her busy and thriving practice in Sedona, AZ. She teaches ayurveda at conferences, in her own clinic, online, and locally at yoga studios in the Southwest. DETAILS 5:00 P.M. PACIFIC | 6:00 P.M. MOUNTAIN | 7:00 P.M. CENTRAL | 8:00 P.M. EASTERN This is a members only event.
